resources:
Mini Cooper Language preference Your system language is English and it will be your default language in this app. You can change it from the language settings tab. This app currently supports English and Simplified Chinese. English will be your default language in this app. You can change it from the language settings tab. Attention! You cannot use this app while driving. Please make sure your vehicle is stationary when using this app. Disclaimer! Please wait... Loading the data Choose your preferred language. Torch function is not supported on your device. Insufficient light to detect objects. Yes, I agree. No, I will exit. OK Loading... Changing language Attention! CANCEL Are you sure you want to exit? Do you want to download the language content? Yes Please connect to the internet to download the content. Cancel Select language Do you really want to exit detection mode? Please turn the device to portrait mode in order to access information about this element. Confirm Do you want to download this vehicle content? It may take several minutes based on the speed of your internet connection. It will be downloaded only once for each vehicle. Connection not found! Content not Available! Status Downloading... Download complete Completed! Vehicle content successfully downloaded. Go to Home page View vehicle Add more vehicles Do you want to remove this vehicle? This will delete all of the downloaded content for this vehicle. Are you sure? Vehicle content is already downloaded. You do not have any vehicle installed yet. Please go to download page and choose your vehicle. Saving Content... No You are currently connected to a low-speed network. Please connect to Wifi/4G/3G to download the file (~100mb). Translated content is currently not available. Do you want to remove this language content? This will delete all the downloaded content for this language. Are you sure? CHOOSE CAR AUGMENTED REALITY 3D AR 2D AR SCAN YOUR DASHBOARD WITH CAMERA EXPLORE NOW DOWNLOAD NOW WARNING LIGHTS WARNING MESSAGES INFO QUICK USER GUIDE SETTINGS START NOW CHOOSE LANGUAGE CHANGE LANGUAGE SEARCH Status Downloading..

Get to know all the controls your INFINITI has to offer using Augmented Reality technology. \n Simply point your smartphone camera at a control and click on the pop-up to access information.
Information on warning lights that may light up in the combination meter of your vehicle is made available to you at the touch of a button. \n Offering quick, simple and easy access to all the information you need.
Access an electronic version of your Quick Reference Guide to discover all the features of your INFINITI.
